sentences.en: A common problem with this method is getting the pucker over the hole.
sentences.cn: 这个方法的共同的问题是在琴孔上(嘴唇要收缩)折叠(起来)得到.

sentences.en: A small fold or pucker made by gathering cloth.
sentences.cn: 聚集或收缩使起皱纹或折子;有皱纹.

sentences.en: But she , with a pucker in her brows, was watching Rhett.
sentences.cn: 可思嘉正蹙着眉头在看瑞德.

sentences.en: Compress lips together . Pucker lips & attempt to whistle.
sentences.cn: 嘴唇内收,嘴 嘬 起来,尝试吹哨.

sentences.en: Duplicate the layer . from filter menu select liquify . Select pucker tool from the tool bar.
sentences.cn: 复制层,在滤镜菜单中选择液化,点击挤压工具.

sentences.en: High resiliency, easy to pucker and non - brittleness.
sentences.cn: 富有弹性, 易于折叠, 非 脆性.

sentences.en: Problem A common problem with this method is getting the pucker over the hole.
sentences.cn: 问题二:这个方法的共同的问题是在琴孔上(嘴唇要收缩)折叠(起来)得到.

sentences.en: Tension must be correct and must not pucker.
sentences.cn: 缝线张力必须正确,不能起皱.

sentences.en: This waistcoat has a propensity to pucker up over the chest.
sentences.cn: 这件背心的胸部常常要皱拢来.

sentences.en: You gotta pucker up your lips, like this . Hm.
sentences.cn: 你必须撅起你的双唇, 就像这样.

sentences.en: You need to pucker up more, like this.
sentences.cn: 嘴巴要再噘一点, 像这样.
